document.full_text: bahrain cut curfew hours on saturday and urged residents to return to work after a crackdown on mainly shi'ite muslim protesters this week raised tensions in the world's largest oil-producing region.
document.title: bahrain eases curfew
lines_and_colors: bahrain cut curfew hours on saturday and urged residents to return to work after a crackdown on mainly shi'ite muslim protesters this week raised tensions in the world's largest oil-producing region.
